review:
Except acting and screenplay, everything is good specially background music. Story is very good throughout the movie and skin show is just there only in songs. Vishal Pandya could have made a better movie by picking up some good actors. This movie was like a Abbas Mustan Type movie with twists and turns and with a fast screenplay. Vishal Pandya is a talented director but he should give up the concept of giving skin show in his movie. 
But still watch this movie one time,you will not be disappoin ...MORE

Except acting and screenplay, everything is good specially background music. Story is very good throughout the movie and skin show is just there only in songs. Vishal Pandya could have made a better movie by picking up some good actors. This movie was like a Abbas Mustan Type movie with twists and turns and with a fast screenplay. Vishal Pandya is a talented director but he should give up the concept of giving skin show in his movie. 
But still watch this movie one time,you will not be disappointed.

This movie is actually good, i don't know why it didn't work out. May be because of its low budget?  Anyway, its a very different story with unexpected suspension. Usually,  the bollywood movies use to be mostly about the feminism and the other 2 parts of Hate story were also about a feminism. But this gives something different and meaningful message in a movie  like we should not ignore the male-rights  here. I know somewhere out there an innocent man or a boy are suffering too like we females  ...MORE

This movie is actually good, i don't know why it didn't work out. May be because of its low budget?  Anyway, its a very different story with unexpected suspension. Usually,  the bollywood movies use to be mostly about the feminism and the other 2 parts of Hate story were also about a feminism. But this gives something different and meaningful message in a movie  like we should not ignore the male-rights  here. I know somewhere out there an innocent man or a boy are suffering too like we females do. For me this movie delivered a very strong message about male-rights,though in a different way but it delivered.

Smart and passionate film shines throughout the climax.. Maybe it is a remake of some Hollywood movie but it's enjoyable. Shadman Joshi not so good Karan Singh Groveer exceptionally good actresses are good in kissing scenes not in acting but Daisy Shah is better than Zareen Khan.. climax good worth to watch.. 
Finally the Hate Story series established his company for Bollywood lovers...

I really liked the movie. The plot,twists and turns are pretty good, I seriously wonder why it didn't work out. Karan Grover's character is amazing,and he plays it with total swag. I didn't like him during his time on TV as I found him overrated,but after watching him in the movie, I was amazed to see his acting skills.

This movie is good, if you ignore the exotic content! Nicely written, directed, and well acted!. Not a big budget movie so you don't see big stars! But fairly good story! Ignore the love making scenes!

Movie and suspense thriller is really awesome but intimate scenes could be shorted to make it because according to thriller it could be super hit also without these kind of scenes but still I wanna appreciate to KSG, Sharman, Zarin and Daisy for excellent performance but specially solute to KSG for outstanding Look in movie

Wasted nearly two hours to have a painful journey through everything that can go bad about a movie. Poor acting, predictablity of the plot, misplaced melodrama, illogical progress. Even a good actor like Sharman Joshi acted like an amateur.
